mt_jwt_auth.jwt_user.storages.django_cache.generate_secret_key()[source]¶
mt_jwt_auth.jwt_user.storages.django_cache.get_random_string(length=12, allowed_chars='abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789')[source]¶

Returns a securely generated random string.

The default length of 12 with the a-z, A-Z, 0-9 character set returns a 71-bit value. log_2((26+26+10)^12) =~ 71 bits
